title: Check the Facts Exercises
introText: Check the Facts helps you see whether your emotional reaction fits what's actually happening. It guides you to pause, look at the evidence, and separate facts from assumptions so you can respond with more clarity and calm.

exercises.title: Fact Finding
exercises.description: Reflect on a situation and identify what is fact versus what is assumption.

reminder.title: Remember
reminder.content: Emotions are real, but they don't always reflect reality. Checking the facts creates space to see situations clearly and choose responses based on what's trueâ€”not on assumptions or fear.
